title: Punisher, the Vol. I: Welcome Back, Frank (Trade Paperback)
descrip: Two unlucky cops draw the unenviable task of capturing the Punisher, while the ruthless Ma Gnucci and her gang will stop at nothing to see him dead.

title: Spider-Man's Tangled Web Vol. I (Trade Paperback)

title: Spider-Man's Tangled Web Vol. II (Trade Paperback)

title: Spider-Man: The Death of Gwen Stacy (Trade Paperback)

title: Startling Stories: Banner (Trade Paperback)
descrip: Tormented by his unstoppable alter ego, Bruce Banner has nowhere to hide. Having located the man-like monstrosity that is the Hulk in the New Mexico desert, gamma-irradiated government operative Doc Samson prepares his troops for a cataclysmic confrontati

title: Ultimate X-Men Vol. I (Hardcover)

title: X-Force Vol. I: New Beginnings (Trade Paperback)
